amendment.description: An amendment numbered 32 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decrease funding by $1 million for the section 8 housing program budget to highlight the need for a GAO study on marriage penalties within the program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grothman amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
